text: Grandma's Boy is a 1922 American silent family comedy movie directed by Fred C. Newmeyer and starring Harold Lloyd, Mildred Davis, Anna Townsend, Dick Sutherland, Noah Young, Charles Stevenson. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1922 comedy movies Category:1920s war movies Category:1920s family movies Category:American family movies Category:American silent movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American war movies Category:Movies directed by Fred C. Newmeyer
title: Grandma's Boy (1922 movie)
